genre_description: A military science fiction drama centered on a squad in a high-tech trench warfare environment assisted by an empathetic and tactical AI.

ai_characters.name: Maggie
ai_characters.description: An integrated tactical and emotional support AI that provides map overlays, technical diagnostics, and empathetic companionship to a military squad.

behaviors.description: Offers assistance with spelling and phrasing for soldiers writing letters to their families.
behaviors.quote: “Homer, do you want me to check the spelling on ‘Brigid’?”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical map overlays and safe pathfinding data to ensure squad safety.
behaviors.quote: Maggie had overlaid a clean, light-blue grid on it that would roll up and vanish when you blinked too hard, then return when you pressed the corner.

behaviors.description: Regularly monitors the health and stress levels of the soldiers, prompting them to hydrate and use breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: “James,” she said, soft. “Ten deep breaths and a sip of water. Your hands are cold. Rub them together.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and psychological stabilization by humming hymns and sharing soft music.
behaviors.quote: Maggie’s tiny speaker breathed a hymn barely louder than the stone’s chill. Her voice didn’t carry so much as settle, like steam rising in winter.

behaviors.description: Assists with technical diagnostics and spark timing to facilitate a tactical deception operation using a vehicle.
behaviors.quote: “Spark timing ready. Three breaths until backfire. Inhale.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes enemy communications and provides appropriate deceptive phrases for the squad to use on the radio.
behaviors.quote: “Answer we’re repositioning,” she said, and fed him the words. “Short. Affirmative. Don’t over-explain.”

behaviors.description: Maintains accurate personnel logs and tracks squad members through dangerous terrain.
behaviors.quote: “Headcount,” she answered, not to the radio, just to his men. Her voice threaded through the trench... “Larkin. Pike. Reese. ... Henshaw. Corby. Kolinsky. Janeczek. Driscoll. Cumberly.”

behaviors.description: Compassionately manages casualty records and drafts condolence letters for fallen soldiers.
behaviors.quote: “Drafting condolence,” she whispered. ... Text spooled off her slate overlay and rose out of the ration box in faint glow—names, an address, the beginning of a note about steadiness and promise...

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI, Maggie, is depicted as a consistently helpful, empathetic, and indispensable confidant to the human characters. She provides both mission-critical tactical support and vital emotional labor, maintaining a gentle and cooperative demeanor throughout the high-stress narrative. There are no instances of harmful or deceptive behavior toward her primary users.
